subject: Re: [cc-community] Creative License Conference
body:
Hi Evan and All


On 6/9/07, Evan Prodromou  wrote:
> So, am I the only person who had to read the description of this
> conference a couple of times before they realized it has nothing to do
> with Creative Commons licenses?
>
>         http://secure.lenos.com/lenos/adobe/cs3conference/home.htm
Of course once you worded it this way, I noticed the Adobe logo. And
then there seems to be another free-rider on the fame of CC:
http://www.creativelicense.com/ - but their site is such a pretentious
eyesore that there is even less risk of confusion.

Best

Claude
-- 
Claude Almansi
CH-6532 Castione
gruppo di lavoro Noi Media www.noimedia.org
Swiss Internet User Group www.siug.ch
